author: chuntaohenryl
title: Best value n service boutique hotel in Paris
text: Centrally located near shopping centre Champ lleysee .good service and friendly and helpful staff .Buffet breakfast of high standard.Check our n checking speedy.bell captain service is wonderful.excellent value in Paris.additional advantage of Michelin star restaurant next doors
